Layout/SpaceInsideBlockBraces.description:
Description

Checks that block braces have or don't have surrounding space. For blocks taking parameters, checks that the left brace has or doesn't have trailing space.
Layout/SpaceInsideBlockBraces.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: space (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['space', 'no_space'] (type: list)
EnforcedStyleForEmptyBraces: no_space (type: str)
SupportedStylesForEmptyBraces: ['space', 'no_space'] (type: list)
SpaceBeforeBlockParameters: True (type: bool)
